Trustee_19_pre_2.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated trustworthiness and pro-sociality by proposing a fair allocation plan that benefits both myself and the investor. I successfully managed the investment and ensured accurate profit distribution, reflecting my competence and adherence to norms. My previous reputation aligns with this positive behavior, as I have consistently acted in the best interest of my investors.
